name: Noah Please!
description:
Noah, you have one task : to allow two of each animal onto the Ark before the Great Flood.

To do so, you shall be granted the ability to WHACK! Use it to push animals you don't need away from the ark and knock them out!

Furthermore, you shall be modestly bestowed with energy orbs, which you shall use judiciously in your effort to manage the boarding.

Watch out for funny-looking animals; if you see one of those, you'll wanna put it down quick before it starts outrunning ya.

Finally, the Minimap will prove a worthy tool at your disposal.

Spots are limited!
